sentences.sentence: Allan Little from Radio 4 took the coveted title of reporter of the year.
sentences.translation: 第4电台的艾伦·利特尔获得了令人垂涎的年度记者的头衔。

sentences.sentence: She coveted his job so openly that their conversations were tense.
sentences.translation: 她如此公开地对他的工作垂涎三尺，以至两人之间的谈话很紧张。

sentences.sentence: Tom presently wondered to find that his coveted vacation was beginning to hang a little heavily on his hands.
sentences.translation: 不久，汤姆惊奇地发现，他渴望已久的假期开始变得有些漫长难熬了。
